title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7201.2 - Safeguards to prevent discrimination
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7201.2 - Safeguards to prevent discrimination

State Regulations

In the discharge of their official duties or in the course
of their employment by or appointment to the commission, no member thereof, employee, agent, member of the medical review board or member of the citizens'
policy and complaint review council shall unlawfully discriminate against any
person based upon such person's HIV antibody status, AIDS-related illness or
diagnosis of AIDS or lack thereof. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7201.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
